Home.subtitle: Discover and rate dishes from the IPB university canteen

Search.requestDishDescription: Can't find what you're looking for? Add it yourself! Please provide all the information you can (name, image, category, tags) and we'll review and confirm it. Your participation helps make the menu better for everyone.
Search.dishSubmittedDescription: Thank you for your contribution! Your dish has been submitted for review. Once approved by our team, it will appear in the dish list.

Dish.uploadImageDescription: Upload an image for this dish. The image will be reviewed before being approved.
Dish.nicknameDescription: If provided, your nickname will be shown when the image is approved.

TopDishes.title: Top Dishes
TopDishes.description: Most popular dishes based on votes

Admin.nicknameDescription: This will be shown as "Image provided by [nickname]" if you upload an image

About.title: About Cantina IPB
About.subtitle: A community-driven guide to IPB canteen dishes
About.description: Cantina IPB is a passion project created to help IPB students discover, rate, and share information about the dishes served at the university canteen. Our goal is to build a comprehensive resource that helps students make informed choices about their meals.
About.disclaimerDescription: This website is NOT officially connected to, affiliated with, or endorsed by the IPB canteen or Instituto Polit√©cnico de Bragan√ßa. It is an independent, voluntary project created by a student for students. All opinions, ratings, and content are contributed by the community and do not represent official views of IPB or its canteen services.
About.missionDescription: To create a helpful resource where IPB students can discover what dishes are served at the canteen, see real photos of meals, and share their experiences. We believe that good information helps everyone make better food choices.
About.acknowledgmentsDescription: The initial batch of dish images was sourced from the <instagramLink></instagramLink> Instagram page. Although permission was requested, the account owner appears to be inactive. We are deeply grateful for their work in documenting canteen dishes, which helped us get this project started. Thank you to whoever ran that account ‚Äì your photos are helping fellow students!
About.communityDrivenDescription: Initially, you may notice that some dishes don't have images or there isn't much data available. That's because this project has just started! The success of Cantina IPB depends 100% on students like you who are willing to upload pictures and add new dishes. Every contribution helps build a valuable resource for current students and future generations.
About.volunteerDescription: This project is created and maintained entirely on a volunteer basis. There is absolutely no financial interest involved ‚Äì no ads, no sponsorships, no data selling. It's purely a gift to the IPB student community. I maintain this project in my free time because I believe it can genuinely help students.
About.openSourceDescription: This project is completely open source and available on GitHub. Everyone is welcome to contribute! Whether you want to fix a bug, add a feature, improve translations, or suggest ideas ‚Äì all pull requests are welcome. I personally review every PR and appreciate all contributions from the community.
About.contributingDescription: Fork the repository, make your changes, and submit a pull request. I'll review it as soon as I can!
About.costNoticeDescription: Running this service has real costs (hosting, database, storage). Please use the platform responsibly and avoid abusing the upload features. If costs become unsustainable, it may affect the project's ability to continue. Thank you for your understanding!
About.contactDescription: Have questions, feedback, or found a bug? Feel free to reach out!
About.thankYouDescription: Thank you for being part of this community. Together, we can build something valuable that will help IPB students for years to come. Every dish you add, every image you upload, and every vote you cast makes a difference!

Welcome.title: Welcome to Cantina IPB! üçΩÔ∏è
Welcome.subtitle: Your community guide to IPB canteen dishes
Welcome.description: We're a student-made platform to help you discover and rate the dishes served at IPB's canteen. Browse meals, see real photos, and share your experiences!
Welcome.workInProgressDescription: You might notice we don't have many dish photos yet ‚Äì that's because we've just launched! This platform grows with YOUR contributions.
Welcome.callToActionDescription: With your help, we can build an amazing resource filled with dish photos and reviews. When you eat at the canteen, snap a photo and upload it! Your contributions will help current students and future generations discover great meals.
Welcome.notOfficial: Note: This is an independent student project, not affiliated with IPB officially.

Rules.title: Canteen Rules
Rules.rule1: On one card, you can order one dish only.
Rules.rule2: To order food, you need to login on
Rules.rule3: The dessert must be only one to be picked.
Rules.rule4: It is highly desired to have a student card with you.
Rules.rule5: You can take up to 1 bread but secretly after getting the plate, later you can get more too if you want.
Rules.rule6: You can ask for a refill for the food.

Menu.noMenuDescription: The daily menu hasn't been added yet. Try searching for the dish you're looking for!
Menu.uploadImageDescription: Upload an image for this menu item. The image will be reviewed before being approved.
Menu.imageCompressionNotice: Images will be automatically compressed to reduce size (max 10MB before compression).
Menu.invalidImageType: Invalid image type. Please upload a JPEG, PNG, WebP, or HEIC image.
Menu.imageTooLarge: Image file is too large. Please use an image smaller than 10MB.
